paragraphs.about: I'm a Software Developer from Helsinki, Finland. My passion is web development and modern solutions.
paragraphs.javascript:
My main area of expertise is JavaScript.

I've used JavaScript for both back-end and front-end development. From small to medium sized websites and applications.

I mainly use JavaScript with modern frameworks like React and Angular, React being my strongest side.

For BackEnd I've used Express
paragraphs.html:
HTML is the standard for creating every website and application.

I know most there is to know about HTML and I have used it to build complex websites, with short and clean syntax.
paragraphs.css:
CSS is the second most important part of a web application.

I've used CSS to create complex designs and light animations. I've mostly focused on the predecessor Sass and Styled Components with React.

This website is built with Styled Components.
paragraphs.csharp:
I started learning C# in school with the basics of game development. Later on I picked it up when I got into .NET.

I've used C# to develop large websites and apps together with ASP.NET MVC in the FrontEnd.

For BackEnd development I've used C# with .NET Core together with Azure.
paragraphs.node:
I've used Node.js for BackEnd Frameworks.

These mainly include, Express together with MongoDB.
